Agnes Mary Porter

  1. Foster Name: Agnes M.
  2. Foster Family: Mike and Mary Ormend
  3. Location of Family: York, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: York, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-07-17, Manhattan, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2003-10-08, Beatrice, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Agnes M. Siegel
  11. Spouse Name: Frank Siegel
  12. Notes: Died in car accident.
  13. Source: Crossroads 2000-04/03-XX; Undated article from Eloise Thomsen Corres.; Social Security Death Index for Agnes M. Siegel; 1930 United States Federal Census; Omaha World-Herald 1982-07-21; National Orphan Train Complex; Tecumseh Chieftain 2003-10-16
